direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods search for elements based on a specific attribute (class vs. tag) but share similar traversal and filtering mechanisms.
Both methods search for elements based on a specific attribute (class vs. any attribute) and share similar traversal and filtering mechanisms.
The select method can be used to achieve similar results as getElementsByClass by using CSS selectors.
The select method with an Evaluator can be used to achieve similar results as getElementsByClass by customizing the evaluation criteria.
Both methods search for elements based on attribute values but with different criteria (class name vs. attribute value).

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require initialization of a parser or similar state before execution.
Environment setup is required before performing element searches.
Both methods verify formats and handle similar exceptions.
